name: Cyber Tactics
description:
Trailer


Overview

Cyber Tactics is a card-based Sci-fi tactical game where the player is given the option to make their own deck out of a large collection of cards. Some cards have better synergy than others so finding the right combination is key to your success. 

With gameplay intended to test your tactical knowledge and increasing difficulty, the player will have to try multiple combinations of deck buildings techniques and tactics to beat all 6 companies.
